NETWORK C $(\phi_{1,2}=2, \phi_{1,3}=1, \phi_{2,3}=1)$   (z1=a, z2=b, z3=c) (q1=x, q2=y, q3=z) b=0.8
#a connected both to b,c, in supply instead only b
#b connected to a,c both supply demand
#c connected both to b,c, in supply instead only b

P1= 10 - 0.8*(q2) - 0.8*(q3) - (q1)
P2= 10 - 0.8*(q1) - 0.8*(q3) - (q2)
P3= 10 - 0.8*(q2) - 0.8*(q1) - (q3)

C1= 5 - (a1) - (a2) - ((n)*(b1)) - ((n)*(b2))
C2= 5 - (b1) - (b2) - (b3) - ((n)*(a1)) - ((n)*(a2)) - ((n)*(c1))
C3= 5 - (c1) - (c2) - ((n)*(b1))
